items.text: there's the big wicket. This stopped on him, tried to punch through cover but committed himself into the stroke and paid the price for it.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, OUT

dismissal.text: SD Hope c Sabbir Rahman b Shakib Al Hasan 25 (43b 3x4 0x6) SR: 58.13

items.preText: Apologies for a few glitches. We're back and hope I'll catch up pretty soon.
items.text: lovely flight again, got him to lunge forward fully as he defended.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, no run

items.text: tossed up, drifting into middle, blocked.

items.text: right back into the crease as he turns this to the leg side

items.text: steps out, and reaches out as he drives to mid-off

items.text: makes room and cuts to deep point
